title: JamesDaniel90
author: JamesDaniel90
content: Next year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more?

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? For altcoin yes. To many good coins to trade since market is going into good position so best to have altcoins and trade it since by this time we may got huge potential to gain. After the effect of bull run for sure all of it will be dump knowing many want to secure their profits. Only bitcoin is the best coin to hold since bitcoin has a big potential to reach a new ATH especially when halving takes effect and hype is starting to build up.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more?  If you already own altcoins, at the next altcoin bull run you should sell and not hold them for too long. Depending on how "recent" the altcoin is, because very old altcoins that have been here for years like Litecoin/Ethereum/DOGE you can sell a part and try to buy back at next bear run - while shitcoin recently launched should be dumped as early as possible on the next rise.But I dont get why you are saying that next year would be a bull run, we cannot predict those and we can only hope.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: If you don't want to be preoccupied from constant trading then set a comfortable price target for you to sell and then leave for a while. Go and take a vacation somewhere else using those profits. You can comeback when the market becomes bearish then slowly start accumulating again. That's what big bag holders usually do from what I know so you may as well follow their lead.

comments.author: maydna
comments.body: The important thing for welcoming the coming of the bull season is that you already own bitcoins. But you can also try to trade altcoins but be careful because many altcoins are still trying to survive before the bull season comes. That can get you in trouble, especially if you lack the skills to analyze the coin.We also don't know which altcoins will get the pump and can only guess. And most of us are wrong in guessing the coins because each coin has the same opportunity to increase high. So if you can't analyze well, you shouldn't trade but just buy and hold, especially holding Bitcoin.

comments.author: Lagduf
comments.body: Im still holding ma token and keep accumulating more tokens from the market. Sell when your token reached ath. The real investors will always take profit and not take picture. So many stupid investors were taking the picture while their investment were pumping and then regret not to sell it. Try to learn from the past mistake by others. You will able to be better in the future. Don't be stupid investors who keep holding their token until the price goes down again.

comments.author: Johnyz
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? Trade if you have knowledge about it but if none, better to do DCA with the best altcoins.There's no assurance for the Bull market this year but we are slowly getting there, so preparing right now might be a good idea.The market are still cheap, there's a lot of time for you to accumulate, have a good holdings first before you do trading because the risk are high in trading and it requires a lot of analysis and research.

comments.author: JayTrain
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? Balance is key during a bull run. While holding can be a safer long-term strategy, trading altcoins can offer opportunities for increased gains. However, it's important to be cautious and informed when trading, as it carries higher risks. Consider your risk tolerance and invest only what you can afford to lose. Diversifying your approach could be a wise choice.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Take profit or save your profits through stable coins then wait again for the bear market and use a bit from that capital to buy back.Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMDo you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? Your call but if I'm happy, I don't mind taking the shortcut route of taking instant profits. Because I'll never know when the better days are going to be back again. If you've been in this market, you're aware of what I'm saying and have been familiar with the volatility. Choose what you think is effective for you. Because what's effective on me might not be good for you.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? First mistake you made was basically saying next year there is a guaranteed bull run.  Second is trying to hit a moving target with trading.  If you are new to trading, it's almost more difficult trading in a bull market market because of the opportunity loss by trading at the wrong times.

comments.author: ElmedoRator
comments.body: If you feel confused about this problem, you can sell them at such a good price that you won't have to worry about it anymore. Take a break for a while to regain your sanity and reflect on the problems you've encountered, and then come back later. Then choose the time to return when the market is in a bearish phase and gradually accumulates again. Then draw up your own strategy and make judgments about the trend and the next bull cycle of the market.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: You can actually make a good deal of money off altcoins if you are lucky enough vs HODLing because let's be honest, coins like Bitcoin, Ethereum, Or LTC are never going 100x or 50x again in the next coming bull run.The downside is buying a shitcoin that could rug pull at any one moment. So only risk what you can afford to lose, especially when it comes to altcoins.

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? Honestly, the bull season is a great time for trading because this time, the market is so active, heavy buy and sell seems to be one reason why we earn a profit in trading. But for me as a long-term holder, I still choose to hold until the ATH comes and sells them. It really depends on us because if you are a full-time trader, your mindset is to keep on trading but if you are just a holder, what you think also is to hold and sell in the perfect time. Decision come out base of what is your desires and wants in life.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Bull run is about taking more profit, so if you are able to acquire crypto during the bear trend then it could be a great profit to you. Altcoins during the bull trend usually pumps along with the market though you have to invest only with the best altcoins since not all altcoins survive the bear market. Trading can also be your best friend, if I were you while doing DCA right now, you should focus as well on learning how to trade effectively.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? I always reap my rewards but I also always retain a portion of my portfolio its not always selling everything in the bull run because you really can't tell high it would go just as we never know the floor price in the bear period, the worse thing that you happen is missing your profit like when it hit an all-time high and you prefer not to sell, then you wake up and you found out that you lose up to 10% of your potential profit because you are holding up that the price will go further, but we really have no idea on how high it would get.I have experienced this and its one of my biggest regret so, just reap the profit when you realize it and sell more on the next pump, just keep monitoring the price in the bull trend.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? You sound very certain that there will be a bullrun next year. I am not so sure about that. Not because i have a different opinion, simply because i think the crypto market is basically impossible to predict. Yes the BTC halving is coming and this usually always had pumping prices as a consequence but this does not necessarily mean that this will happen again next time also.I think daytrading during a full on bull run does not make a lot of sense because if every project is pumping like crazy you can not really make a lot of profit by buying and selling them. Of course there will be corrections and falling prices too during a bull run but those are hard to hit i think. I just hodl and when my portfolio has a value that is lifechanging to me i sell. If that ever happens.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: Quote from: JamesDaniel90 on May 25, 2023, 02:59:27 PMNext year will be my first bull run and have just been thinking about what will be best to do when it finally arrives next year.Do you plan on just holding till an amount you are happy with or is it a good idea to try and trade altcoins whilst they are pumping to earn even more? I wouldn't assume just yet that the bullrun is for the next year. And even if we were basing it off the halving, it's usually after half a year to a year of the event itself no?Anyway assuming you'd participate in the next bullrun, whenever that is, I'd actively trade altcoins yea. The market is really active so you're going to see a lot of buys and sells. If you can manage, then you should be able to make some profit.

comments.author: royalfestus
comments.body: I do not endorse the concept of HODLing in cryptocurrency, and I advise newcomers to exercise caution regarding this distraction. The notion of a supercycle emerged from this, but it ultimately proved unsuccessful. My plan is to sell strategically, aiming to maximize my gains in the market at various price points, including lows, highs, and everything in between.

comments.author: Iyeman
comments.body: Im happy with my amounts. getting 10x increase will be enough for me to be honest. Im waiting for the miracle to see bitcoin to go to the moon again. The halving phase will come again very soon. it seems like that if this gonna be another long time journey caused by there's no gaurantee if the bullish trend gonna happen again for bitcoin. I hope that it will be going tot he 70k again.

comments.author: shinratensei_
comments.body: in the stage of bullrun most certainly you should just take the profits, the coin that you have accumulated through out the corrections should now have multiple if not more valuation than it was before.meaning it's definitely the opportunity for you to harvest your investment so I doubt someone would just hold their coin all the way through the bullrun and until bearish coming again since that would come out looking so foolish.otherwise if you don't accumulate mainly because you just outright missed the chance of accumulating around bearish then you can just trade and make some little growth to your capital after all even thougheverything in bullrun market seems like increasing but here's the thing, to trade around bullrun, means you would have higher chance of risking your capital when suddenly bullrun ends, all your effort of growing your capital will just in vain.
